metadata.titleEn: ASTER GDEM data in the Heihe River Basin (2009)
metadata.description:
The data set includes ASTER GDEM data and its Mosaic.
ASTER Global DEM (ASTER GDEM) is a Global digital elevation data product jointly released by NASA and Japan's ministry of economy, trade and industry (METI) on June 29, 2009. The DEM data is based on the observation results of NASA's new earth observation satellite TERRA.It is produced by the ASTER(Advanced Space borne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radio meter) sensor, which collects 1.3 million stereo image data, covering more than 99% of the earth's land surface.The data has a horizontal accuracy of 30 m (95% confidence) and an elevation accuracy of 7-14 m (95% confidence).This data is the third global elevation data, which is significantly higher than previous SRTM3 DEM and GTOPO30 data.
We from NASA's web site (http://wist.echo.nasa.gov/api) to download the data of heihe river basin, and through the data center to distribute.The data distributed by the center completely retains the original appearance of the data without any modification to the data.If users need details about ASTER GDEM preparation process, please refer to the data documents of metadata connections, or visit http://www.ersdac.or.jp/GDEM/E/3.html or directly from https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/ reading and ASTER Global DEM related documents.
ASTER GDEM is divided into several data blocks of 1×1 degree in distribution, and the distribution format is zip compression format. Each compressed file includes three files. The file naming format is as follows:
          ASTGTM_NxxEyyy_dem.tif
          ASTGTM_NxxEyyy_num.tif
          reademe.pdf
         Where xx is the starting latitude and yyy is the starting longitude._dem. Tif is the dem data file, _num. Tif is the data quality file, and reademe is the data description file.
In order to facilitate users to use the data, on the basis of the fractional ASTER GDEM data, we splice fractional SRTM data to prepare the ASTER GDEM Mosaic map of the black river basin, which retains all the original features of ASTER GDEM without any resamulation.   
This data includes two files: heihe_aster_gdem_mosaic_dem.img Heihe_Aster_GDEM_Mosaic_num. Img
The data is stored in the format of Erdas image, where the file _dem.img is the dem data file and the file _num. Img is the data quality file.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包括ASTER GDEM数据及其镶嵌图。
      ASTER Global DEM（简称ASTER GDEM）是美国是美国航空航天局 (NASA )和日本经济产业省(METI)于2009年6月29日联合发布的全球数字高程数据产品, 该DEM数据是根据NASA新一代对地观测卫星TERRA的观测结果完成，是由ASTER(Advanced Space borne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radio meter)传感器搜集的130万个立体像对数据制作，其覆盖范围超过了地球99%陆地表面。该数据的水平精度30米（置信度95%），高程精度为7-14米（置信度95%）。该数据是第三个全球范围内的高程数据，较之以前的SRTM3 DEM和GTOPO30数据有明显的提高。
	我们从NASA数据网站上（http://wist.echo.nasa.gov/api）下载了黑河流域的数据，并通过本数据中心重新分发。本中心分发的数据完全保留了数据的原貌，没有对数据进行任何修改。用户如需详细了解ASTER GDEM的制备过程，请参考本元数据连接的数据文档，或直接访问http://www.ersdac.or.jp/GDEM/E/3.html or from https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/阅读与ASTER Global DEM 相关的文档.  
 	ASTER GDEM在分发是被分割为若干1×1度的数据块，分发格式为zip压缩格式，每个压缩文件包括三个文件，文件命名格式如下：
	ASTGTM_NxxEyyy_dem.tif
        ASTGTM_NxxEyyy_num.tif
        reademe.pdf
	其中xx为起始纬度，yyy为起始经度。_dem.tif为dem数据文件，_num.tif为数据质量文件，reademe为该数据说明文件。 
      为了便于用户使用数据，在分幅ASTER GDEM数据的基础上，我们将分数SRTM数据进行拼接制备了黑河流域ASTER GDEM镶嵌图，该数据保留了ASTER GDEM的全部原始特征，没有经过任何重采样处理。         本数据包括两个文件：                    Heihe_ASTER_GDEM_Mosaic_dem.img Heihe_Aster_GDEM_Mosaic_num.img 
数据采用Erdas image格式存储,其中_dem.img文件是dem数据文件，_num.img是数据质量文件。
metadata.instructions:
File naming: the data is stored in raster TIF format, ASTER GDEM is divided into a number of 1×1 degree data blocks in distribution, distribution format is zip compression format, each compressed file includes three files, file naming format is as follows:      
          ASTGTM_NxxEyyy_dem.tif
          ASTGTM_NxxEyyy_num.tif
          reademe.pdf
         Where xx is the starting latitude and yyy is the starting longitude._dem. Tif is the dem data file, _num. Tif is the data quality file, and reademe is the data description file.
Data reading: Arcgis, Envi and other remote sensing software can be used to open and read.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：数据以栅格TIF格式存储，ASTER GDEM在分发是被分割为若干1×1度的数据块，分发格式为zip压缩格式，每个压缩文件包括三个文件，文件命名格式如下：
	ASTGTM_NxxEyyy_dem.tif
        ASTGTM_NxxEyyy_num.tif
        reademe.pdf
	其中xx为起始纬度，yyy为起始经度。_dem.tif为dem数据文件，_num.tif为数据质量文件，reademe为该数据说明文件。
数据读取：可以用Arcgis、Envi等遥感软件打开读取。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific features and precision metrics of digital elevation models used in global terrain mapping?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 全球地形测绘中使用的数字高程模型的具体特征和精度指标是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 30 meters horizontal accuracy, 7 to 14 meters elevation accuracy
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 水平精度30米，垂直精度7到14米。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the horizontal accuracy of the ASTER GDEM dataset used for the Heihe River Basin?
Quantification.QuestionCn: ASTER GDEM 数据集在黑河流域的水平精度是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the ASTER Global DEM (ASTER GDEM) and how is it utilized in digital elevation data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: ASTER全球数字高程模型（ASTER GDEM）是什么，它如何用于数字高程数据收集？
Definition.AnswerEn: The ASTER Global DEM (ASTER GDEM) is a global digital elevation model product created from the observations made by the Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer (ASTER) sensor on NASA's Terra satellite. Released jointly by NASA and Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) in 2009, ASTER GDEM utilizes 1.3 million stereo pairs of data to cover over 99% of the Earth's land surface. The data has a horizontal accuracy of 30 meters and a vertical accuracy of 7-14 meters, both at a 95% confidence level. It is distributed globally in segments of 1×1 degree data blocks, with each block including a DEM data file and a data quality file, provided in a compressed zip format. The DEM data is used for various applications, such as topographic mapping, terrain analysis, and environmental studies. In the context of the Heihe River Basin, ASTER GDEM data has been downloaded and redistributed without modification, and a mosaic of the data has been created to facilitate its use, preserving all original features without resampling.
Definition.AnswerCn: ASTER全球数字高程模型（ASTER GDEM）是一个全球数字高程模型产品，基于NASA的Terra卫星上先进的空间热发射和反射辐射仪（ASTER）传感器的观测数据创建。该产品于2009年由NASA和日本经济产业省（METI）联合发布，利用130万个立体对数据覆盖了超过99%的陆地表面。该数据的水平精度为30米，垂直精度为7-14米，均在95%的置信水平下。数据以1×1度的数据块形式在全球范围内分发，每个数据块包括一个DEM数据文件和一个数据质量文件，均以压缩zip格式提供。DEM数据用于各种应用，如地形制图、地形分析和环境研究。在黑河流域的背景下，ASTER GDEM数据已被下载并无修改地重新分发，并创建了数据的马赛克，以便于使用，保留了所有原始特征而未进行重采样。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the horizontal and vertical accuracy of ASTER GDEM data compare to that of previous global elevation datasets like SRTM3 DEM and GTOPO30?
Comparison.QuestionCn: ASTER GDEM数据的水平和垂直精度与之前的全球高程数据集如SRTM3 DEM和GTOPO30相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The ASTER GDEM data provides a horizontal accuracy of 30 meters (with 95% confidence) and a vertical accuracy ranging from 7 to 14 meters (with 95% confidence), which shows a significant improvement over previous datasets like SRTM3 DEM and GTOPO30.
Comparison.AnswerCn: ASTER GDEM数据提供了30米的水平精度（95%置信度）和7到14米的垂直精度（95%置信度），这相比于之前的数据集如SRTM3 DEM和GTOPO30有了显著的改善。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the improvement in accuracy of global elevation data compared to previous datasets like SRTM3 DEM and GTOPO30?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 与之前的数据集如SRTM3 DEM和GTOPO30相比，全球高程数据准确性提高的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The improvement in accuracy of global elevation data is due to the use of 1.3 million stereo pairs collected by the ASTER sensor on NASA's TERRA satellite, which provides a horizontal accuracy of 30 meters and an elevation accuracy of 7-14 meters with a 95% confidence level. This has led to better coverage and precision, surpassing previous datasets like SRTM3 DEM and GTOPO30.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 全球高程数据准确性的提高得益于NASA的TERRA卫星上ASTER传感器收集的130万对立体图像，这些数据提供了30米的水平精度和7-14米的高程精度，置信水平为95%。这使得覆盖范围和精度得到了改善，超越了之前的数据集，如SRTM3 DEM和GTOPO30。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the key objectives behind creating a digital elevation model using ASTER GDEM data for the Heihe River Basin, and how do these objectives influence the methodologies employed in its data collection and distribution?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 创建数字高程模型（DEM）使用ASTER GDEM数据在黑河流域的关键目标是什么，这些目标如何影响其数据收集和分发的方法论？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective of creating a digital elevation model using ASTER GDEM data for the Heihe River Basin is to provide a detailed and accurate representation of the earth's surface topography in that region, with a horizontal accuracy of 30 meters and an elevation accuracy of 7-14 meters. This goal influences the methodologies employed in data collection by necessitating the use of stereo pair data from the ASTER sensor on NASA's Terra satellite, ensuring comprehensive coverage of over 99% of the earth’s land surface. The data is distributed in a format that retains its original features and is divided into 1x1 degree tiles to facilitate user accessibility and manageability while maintaining data quality through the inclusion of quality files.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用ASTER GDEM数据为黑河流域创建数字高程模型的主要目标是提供该地区地表地形的详细和准确表示，水平精度为30米，海拔精度为7-14米。这个目标影响了数据收集所采用的方法，要求使用来自NASA Terra卫星的ASTER传感器的立体对数据，以确保对超过99%的地球陆地表面的全面覆盖。数据以保留其原始特征的格式分发，并分为1x1度的瓦片，以便用户访问和管理，同时通过包含质量文件来保持数据质量。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedures to access and utilize global digital elevation data from ASTER GDEM for topographical analysis in a specific region like the Heihe River Basin?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 访问和利用全球数字高程数据（ASTER GDEM）进行特定区域（如黑河流域）的地形分析的程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To access and utilize global digital elevation data from ASTER GDEM for topographical analysis in a specific region, one can download the relevant data from NASA's data website. The data is distributed in 1x1 degree blocks in zip format, containing DEM and data quality files, as well as a README file. For a specific region like the Heihe River Basin, the data has been mosaicked to create a comprehensive DEM without any resampling, stored in Erdas image format. Users should refer to the data documentation for detailed information on the preparation process.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 要访问和利用来自ASTER GDEM的全球数字高程数据进行特定区域的地形分析，可以从NASA的数据网站下载相关数据。数据以1x1度的块状形式分发，采用zip格式，包含DEM和数据质量文件，以及README文件。对于像黑河流域这样的特定区域，数据已被拼接成一个综合的DEM，没有进行任何重采样，存储在Erdas图像格式中。用户应参考数据文档以获取有关准备过程的详细信息。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate the data collection methods and challenges involved in compiling a global digital elevation model based on ASTER data, and discuss potential improvements for future elevation datasets.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查基于ASTER数据编制全球数字高程模型的数据收集方法和挑战，并讨论未来高程数据集的潜在改进。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The ASTER Global DEM (ASTER GDEM) data, released by NASA and Japan's METI, is based on observations from the TERRA satellite using the ASTER sensor. The dataset includes 1.3 million stereo pair images, covering over 99% of the Earth's land surface. It boasts a horizontal accuracy of 30 meters and an elevation accuracy of 7-14 meters at a 95% confidence level, which is a significant improvement over previous DEM datasets like SRTM3 DEM and GTOPO30. ASTER GDEM data is distributed in 1x1 degree blocks compressed in zip format, containing a DEM data file, a data quality file, and a README. Despite its advantages, challenges in creating such datasets include maintaining high accuracy over diverse terrains and ensuring comprehensive coverage. Improvements could involve integrating data from multiple satellite missions to enhance accuracy and reduce gaps, and employing advanced algorithms for better data processing and synthesis.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: ASTER全球数字高程模型（ASTER GDEM）数据由美国宇航局和日本的METI发布，基于TERRA卫星的ASTER传感器观测。该数据集包含130万对立体图像，覆盖了地球陆地表面的99%以上。它的水平精度为30米，95%置信水平下的高程精度为7-14米，这比之前的数字高程模型数据集如SRTM3 DEM和GTOPO30有了显著改善。ASTER GDEM数据以1x1度的块状形式分发，压缩为zip格式，包含一个DEM数据文件、一个数据质量文件和一个自述文件。尽管具有这些优势，创建此类数据集的挑战包括在多样化地形上保持高精度以及确保全面覆盖。改进措施可以包括整合来自多个卫星任务的数据，以提高精度并减少空白区域，以及采用先进算法以改善数据处理和合成。
